TextEng: "Back off! I'm not falling for any trap!"
"I don't have time to chat with spirits."
"I'll be back once I get that soul gem."
"How do I know I can trust you?"
Text: "널 믿을 수 있다는 걸 어떻게 알지?"

TextEng: "I want to ask you some questions first."
"Do you know anything about the golems here?"
"Give me the password, then you'll have your gem."
<StartAction>Persuade: Bluff</Start> "My word is my vow. I will not betray you."
Text: <StartAction>설득: 허세</Start> "내 말이 곧 서약이야. 배신하지 않을게."

TextEng: <StartAction>Persuade: Intimidate</Start> "I could just leave you trapped here forever."
Text: <StartAction>설득: 위협</Start> "널 영원히 여기 가둬둘 수도 있어."

TextEng: <StartAction>Persuade</Start> "I'm your only hope. That means I make the rules."
Text: <StartAction>설득</Start> "나만이 네 희망이야. 그러니 규칙은 내가 정해."

TextEng: "Here's the soul gem." <StartAction>Give him the soul gem</Start>
"I think I'll just leave you there to rot."
"Where can I find the soul gem?"
